title: Jadience Herbal Formulas Meditation Soak 16 Ounces
description: At Life Nutrition Center we believe that the body can cure itself. Those who practice homeopathic therapies use tiny amounts of natural substances, like plants and minerals. They believe these stimulate the healing process of the body.
cleaned_text: Immerse yourself in this incredible soak of East Asian herbs that is designed to help you achieve a deeper and more rewarding meditation experience. Release blocked energy from deep within your body and allow chi to flow optimally throughout your body. This centuries-proven formula will promote mental clarity and focus, while your body becomes deeply relaxed, allowing you to attain a truly meditative state. Feel the difference for yourself!
